I have installed VisualStudio .NET and have built Cantera and 
installed it as well.

I am in the process of testing Cantera (I have Windows 2000 Pro, 
Python2.4 and Numarray 1.1.1).

Python gives the following ImportError when testing demo files:

IDLE 1.1      ==== No Subprocess ====
>>> 
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\CANTERA\demos\Python\mix1.py", line 18, in ?
    from Cantera import *
ImportError: No module named Cantera
>>> 

The C++ debugger output gives the following when trying to test the 
demo.cpp file:

'demo.exe': Loaded 'C:\CANTERA\demos\C++\Debug\demo.exe', Symbols 
loaded.
'demo.exe': Loaded 'C:\WINNT\system32\NTDLL.DLL', Cannot find or open 
a required DBG file.
'demo.exe': Loaded 'C:\WINNT\system32\msvcp71d.dll', Symbols loaded.
'demo.exe': Loaded 'C:\WINNT\system32\msvcr71d.dll', Symbols loaded.
'demo.exe': Loaded 'C:\WINNT\system32\KERNEL32.DLL', Cannot find or 
open a required DBG file.
'demo.exe': Loaded 'C:\WINNT\system32\msvcr71.dll', Symbols loaded.
'demo.exe': Loaded 'C:\WINNT\system32\ADVAPI32.DLL', Cannot find or 
open a required DBG file.
'demo.exe': Loaded 'C:\WINNT\system32\rpcrt4.dll', Cannot find or 
open a required DBG file.
'demo.exe': Unloaded 'C:\WINNT\system32\ADVAPI32.DLL'
'demo.exe': Unloaded 'C:\WINNT\system32\rpcrt4.dll'
First-chance exception at 0x77e9bbf3 in demo.exe: Microsoft C++ 
exception: Cantera::CanteraError @ 0x0012f348.
The program '[824] demo.exe: Native' has exited with code 0 (0x0).

Could you help me with this, I am eager to implement Cantera in my 
Reactive Flow CFD program.
Thank you
